thread.title: Kit Siang volunteers to speak at Umno-BN forex roadshow
thread.title_full: Kit Siang volunteers to speak at Umno-BN forex roadshow

title: Kit Siang volunteers to speak at Umno-BN forex roadshow
text:
More 
Lim Kit Siang has volunteered to speak at Umno and BN's roadshow on the special task force probing Bank Negara's foreign exchange trading losses in the 1990s. 
"(Umno information chief) Annuar Musa should inform me in the next 48 hours whether I have to re-schedule my programmes from Feb 25 onwards in order to speak at the launch-off of the Umno and BN's roadshow this Saturday," said the DAP veteran in a statement. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
